mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shopping_list ( item_id, user_id, status, added_at, purchased_flg, name, amount, category_id, category_name, purchase_date ) VALUES ( #{itemId}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{addedAt}, #{purchasedFlg}, #{name}, #{amount}, #{categoryId}, #{categoryName}, #{purchaseDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shopping_list ORDER BY added_at DESC
